page.title: 15NEWS STORIES OF 1985 CONT...
page.content:
HUMAN INTEREST
Murray Haydon the worlds third recipient of a permanent artifical heart is recovering quickly from the operation.The Heart Institute is worried about William Schroeder who received his heart on November 25th 1984.He is weak,tired and discouraged after a stroke and there are doubts whether he will leave hospital.
FOREIGN A quarter of the babies born in Bhopal have died because gas has leaked.These unusually high figures have surprised experts greatly,since it was expected that the toxic methyl isocyanate gas which covered the town on the morning of December 3rd 1984.
